short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights return policy of items on amazon and flpkart.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On amazon sites listed below and flipkart.com, this extension adds a bar on top of the product page with the return policy highlighted.

Well tested on .in and some testing done on these amazon sites: .in, .ca, .com, .com.mx, .co.uk, .de, .es

v0.4: reduced size by 30k by removing big 512px icon file. Also now has better quality icons files. So, lesser and faster to install and it will look better.
